text: A beginner’s version of the Tortoise (乌龟) and the Hare (兔子).A more precise word for hare is 野兔.A rabbit  and a turtle ran in the summer race.The rabbit ran very fast. She saw the turtle walking slowly, and went to sleep under the tree.Although the turtle went very slowly, he did not stop and kept going.When the rabbit woke up, the turtle had already won.This story tells us not to give up, and that perseverance will give us results.
